SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.controllers.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEventHandler, MainEventHandler, UI
public class GameController extends Controller
Controller for the GameScene. It allows users to play the game.

    • playCard

      public void playCard(PlayerToken playerToken, int cardId, CardSide cardSide, Coords coords)
      Represents the action of playing a card on a board, GUI side. Places the card and removes it from the hand.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player
      cardId - id of the card
      cardSide - side of the card played
      coords - coordinates where the card is played

    • removeCardFromHand

      public void removeCardFromHand(PlayerToken playerToken, int cardId)
      Allows to remove a card from a player's hand, GUI side. Sets a placeholder in the slot emptied, and disables all functionalities of the slot, if needed.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player
      cardId - id of the card to remove

    • handleDeckMouseClicked

      public void handleDeckMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the click on a deck. Removes the card from the deck and adds the card to the hand, updating their corresponding ImageView Requires correct turn, deck not empty and an available slot in the hand.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - click MouseEvent

    • handleVisibleListMouseClicked

      public void handleVisibleListMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent)
      Handles the click on a visible card. Puts the card in the player's hand, and takes a new card if the corresponding deck is not empty. Requires correct turn and a non-null slot.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - the clicked MouseEvent

    • handlePlayedCardEvent

      public void handlePlayedCardEvent(PlayerToken playerToken, int playedCardId, CardSide playedCardSide, Coords playedCardCoordinates)
      Description copied from interface: GameEventHandler
      This method handles the received update of a played card
      Specified by:
      handlePlayedCardEvent in interface GameEventHandler
      Overrides:
      handlePlayedCardEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the player token which played the card
      playedCardId - the id of the played card
      playedCardSide - the side of the played card
      playedCardCoordinates - the coordinates of the played card

    • handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent

      public void handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent(PlayerToken playerToken, int drawnCardId, boolean deckEmptied, Integer nextCardId, int handIndex)
      Description copied from interface: GameEventHandler
      This method handles the received update of a drawn card from the gold deck
      Specified by:
      handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent in interface GameEventHandler
      Overrides:
      handleDrawnGoldDeckCardEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the token of the player who draws the card from the gold deck
      drawnCardId - the drawn card id
      deckEmptied - a flag that is true if the deck is now empty, false otherwise
      nextCardId - the id of the next card; null if there is no next card
      handIndex - the position (0,1,2) of the drawn card in the player hand

    • handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent

      public void handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent(PlayerToken playerToken, int drawnCardId, boolean deckEmptied, Integer nextCardId, int handIndex)

      handleDrawnResourceDeckCardEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:
      playerToken - the player token which drew the card
      drawnCardId - the id of the drawn card
      deckEmptied - a flag that is true if the deck is now empty, false otherwise
      nextCardId - the id of the next card; null if there is no next card
      handIndex - the position (0,1,2) of the drawn card in the player hand

    • handleCardsPlayabilityEvent

      Allows the player to retrieve data on where his cards can be placed. Event is only read by the intended receiver.

    • cardsPlayabilityEnable

      public void cardsPlayabilityEnable()
      Enables needed panes and nodes for a player to see where his cards can be placed. Enables mouse clicking for all cards, and hovering only for playable cards.

    • handlePlayerTurnEvent

      public void handlePlayerTurnEvent(PlayerToken turn)
      Handles a player turn event. Notifies the player of the turn event, and if the current turn is the player's, enables his hand.
      Specified by:
      handlePlayerTurnEvent in interface GameEventHandler
      Overrides:
      handlePlayerTurnEvent in class Controller
      Parameters:
      turn - the new turn

    • playCardEnable

      public void playCardEnable()
      Enables needed panes and nodes for the player to play his card. As card Hover and card Click are already enabled by CardsPlayabilityEvent, the PlayCardEvent only enables the drag and drop.

    • playCardDisable

      public void playCardDisable()
      Disables the structures after the player played the card.

    • drawCardEnable

      public void drawCardEnable()
      Enables non-empty decks when it's self's turn.

    • drawCardDisable

      public void drawCardDisable()
